TopicTitle: In training, VAB leads to PC lock

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Since yesterday I'm a Ksp2 User. I started in the training center. When I completed the first 2 courses it was time to head into the VAB. But, as soon as the loading finished my Pc would lock up/freeze. I need to do a forced reboot in order to get my Pc working again.

Today I tried it again, same issue, same situation.

Other games are running fine.

Anyone know anything I can do?

Greetings Erik!
